grenade: ^There's a lot of shouting coming from a trio of men passing a beach ball around. They're shouting and cheering, even though the beach ball is floating very slowly in the air, from one pair of hands to another.
^They stop at one point, however, and let the ball fall right between them. You can't really hear what they're saying, but the cheerful shouting soon turns into a shouting match.
leave: ^SADsOP men are kind of scary when you're not mentally prepared for it. It's best that you leave, anyway.
approach: ^You slow the van down next to them. Stuck in their little spat, they don't notice you.
^Why are we playing with this stupid ball, bro? This is so boring...
^<color=#C6713F>Bros, bros, it's not even SADURDAY, like... we can try new stuff... this is all we have-</color>
^But the grenade falls better. It fits better in our hands, dude! It doesn't... float away!
^<color=#BE3D3D>Yea... how can we play Hot Grenade without a grenade?</color>
^... They use a grenade for a ball?
^<color=#BE3D3D>Yo, what are you staring at us for?</color>
drive: ^You've been spotted eavesdropping. You have nothing to offer, so you hit the gas.
give: ^<color=#BE3D3D>WOW NO WAY! YOU HAVE ONE ON YOU?!</color>
^<color=#C6713F>Bros, this even has a label... it's probably ours anyway! They probably stole it-</color>
^The one who you gave the grenade to waves it in the air carelessly. The other two look up at it like it's a holy artifact.
^<color=#BE3D3D>Here dude, reward time. You totally saved our ass.</color>
^They go back to playing, kicking the beach ball aside. Now they seem like they're actually playing football with the grenade, tossing it at each other.
